## Registration System Open Now

- Register here: **[https://ecommerce.apps.qub.ac.uk/osisre/catalog/index.php](https://ecommerce.apps.qub.ac.uk/osisre/catalog/index.php)**
- **Early registration ends 30 April 2024, 23:59 PST.**
- **The *Economy* rates apply to students, postdocs, and attendees affiliated with universities in [Low- to Middle-Income Countries](list_countries.qmd)**

## Cancellations

You can cancel your registration until 20 June. We will refund registration fee with a 5% charge. 

**⚠ No refunds are possible after 20 June.**
